verses.verse: וָאָשׁ֕וּב <WH7725> va-'a-Shuv Then I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa and lifted up עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh; and looked וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְגִלָּ֥ה <WH4039> me-gil-Lah roll עָפָֽה׃ <WH5774> 'a-Fah. and behold a flying

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> mah What אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> ro-'Eh; unto me What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar, thou;And I answered אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> ro-'Eh I see מְגִלָּ֣ה <WH4039> me-gil-Lah roll עָפָ֔ה <WH5774> 'a-Fah, a flying אָרְכָּהּ֙ <WH753> 'a-re-Kah the length עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim thereof [is] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרָחְבָּ֖הּ <WH7341> ve-ra-che-Bah and the breadth עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> 'E-ser thereof ten בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> ba-'am-Mah. cubits

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about זֹ֚את <WH2063> zot likewise הָֽאָלָ֔ה <WH423> ha-'a-Lah, he unto me This [is] the curse הַיּוֹצֵ֖את <WH3318> hai-yo-Tzet that goeth forth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei over the face כָל־ <WH3605> chol of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the whole earth כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki surely כָל־ <WH3605> chol everyone הַגֹּנֵ֗ב <WH1589> hag-go-Nev, for every one that stealeth מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> miz-Zeh This כָּמ֣וֹהָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-ha [as] on this side according נִקָּ֔ה <WH5352> nik-Kah, shall be cut off וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and everyone הַנִּ֨שְׁבָּ֔ע <WH7650> han-Nish-Ba', to it and every one that sweareth מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh one כָּמ֥וֹהָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-ha [as] on that side according נִקָּֽה׃ <WH5352> nik-Kah. shall be cut off

הוֹצֵאתִ֗יהָ <WH3318> ho-tze-Ti-ha, I will bring it forth נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts וּבָ֙אָה֙ <WH935> u-Va-'ah and it shall enter אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit into the house הַגַּנָּ֔ב <WH1590> hag-gan-Nav, of the thief וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> beit and into the house הַנִּשְׁבָּ֥ע <WH7650> han-nish-Ba' of him that sweareth בִּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> bish-Mi by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> lash-Sha-ker; falsely וְלָ֙נֶה֙ <WH3885> ve-La-neh and it shall remain בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bei-To, of his house וְכִלַּ֖תּוּ <WH3615> ve-chil-Lat-tu and shall consume וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et for עֵצָ֥יו <WH6086> 'e-Tzav it with the timber וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et for אֲבָנָֽיו׃ <WH68> 'a-va-Nav. thereof and the stones

וַיֵּצֵ֕א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze with me went forth הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> ham-mal-'Ach Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me שָׂ֣א <WH5375> sa unto me Lift up נָ֤א <WH4994> na now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> u-re-'Eh, and see מָ֖ה <WH4100> mah what הַיּוֹצֵ֥את <WH3318> hai-yo-Tzet what [is] this that goeth forth הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. I

וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar And I said מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What הִ֑יא <WH1931> Hi; and he וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, What [is] it;And he said זֹ֤את <WH2063> zot likewise הָֽאֵיפָה֙ <WH374> ha-'ei-Fah This [is] an ephah הַיּוֹצֵ֔את <WH3318> hai-yo-Tzet, that goeth forth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer He said זֹ֥את <WH2063> zot likewise עֵינָ֖ם <WH5869> 'ei-Nam moreover This [is] their resemblance בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. through all the earth

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold כִּכַּ֥ר <WH3603> kik-Kar a talent עֹפֶ֖רֶת <WH5777> 'o-Fe-ret of lead נִשֵּׂ֑את <WH5375> nis-Set; And behold there was lifted up וְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> ve-zoT is a אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah woman אַחַ֔ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, and this [is] a יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> yo-She-vet that sitteth בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> ha-'ei-Fah. of the ephah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said זֹ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise הָרִשְׁעָ֔ה <WH7564> ha-rish-'Ah, This [is] wickedness וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> vai-yash-Lech And he cast אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch it into the midst הָֽאֵיפָ֑ה <WH374> ha-'ei-Fah; of the ephah וַיַּשְׁלֵ֛ךְ <WH7993> vai-yash-Lech and he cast אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven the weight הָעֹפֶ֖רֶת <WH5777> ha-'o-Fe-ret of lead אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> Pi-ha. upon the mouth ס sa-Mek

וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa Then lifted I up עֵינַ֜י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֵ֗רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re, and looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and there שְׁתַּ֨יִם <WH8147> she-Ta-yim two נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> na-Shim women יֽוֹצְאוֹת֙ <WH3318> yotz-'Ot and behold there came out וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach and the wind בְּכַנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3671> be-chan-fei-Hem, [was] in their wings וְלָהֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> ve-la-Hen-nah for they had כְנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> che-na-Fa-yim wings כְּכַנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> ke-chan-Fei like the wings הַחֲסִידָ֑ה <WH2624> ha-cha-si-Dah; of a stork וַתִּשֶּׂ֙אנָה֙ <WH5375> vat-tis-Se-nah and they lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֵיפָ֔ה <WH374> ha-'ei-Fah, the ephah בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz between the earth וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. and the heaven

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar Then said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> ham-mal-'Ach I to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; אָ֛נָה <WH575> 'A-nah Where הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah are they מֽוֹלִכ֖וֹת <WH1980> mo-li-Chot taking אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> ha-'ei-Fah. ephah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> Liv-not- unto me To build לָ֥הֿ lah בַ֖יִת <WH1004> Va-yit it an house בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁנְעָ֑ר <WH8152> shin-'Ar; of Shinar וְהוּכַ֛ן <WH3559> ve-hu-Chan and it shall be established וְהֻנִּ֥יחָה <WH3240> ve-hun-Ni-chah and set שָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- her own מְכֻנָתָֽהּ׃ <WH4369> me-chu-na-Tah. there upon her own base ס sa-Mek
